main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in Madison, Tennessee on 9 November 1962, with descriptions of various objects and behaviors.
interesting points: One object observed was of magnitude 3 lasting 3-4 seconds,Other objects were approximately 1/3 the magnitude, A silhouette-like moving object was seen which covered 20 degrees in 15 seconds, The sighting likely involved a probable meteor as concluded in the report, There were similar previous sightings reported in the area with different descriptions.
witness description: The observer described seeing a moving object against the horizon with reflecting light characteristics.
